text: Yesli by byl Koran, blagodarya kotoromu sdvinulis' by gory, razverzlas' by zemlya ili zagovorili by pokoyniki, to im okazalsya by etot Koran. No lyuboye resheniye ostayetsya tol'ko za Allakhom. Razve veruyushchiye yeshche ne znayut, chto yesli by Allakh zakhotel, to nastavil by vsekh lyudey na pryamoy put'? Bedstviya ne perestanut porazhat' neveruyushchikh za to, chto oni sodeyali, ili budut ryadom s ikh zhilishchami do tekh por, poka ne yavitsya obeshchaniye Allakha. Voistinu, Allakh ne narushayet Svoyego obeshchaniya
